content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Good afternoon, thank you for considering my apartment. In terms of the rental price, I would like to propose a starting point of 500 Euros per month. This price reflects the location and the quality of the apartment, and I believe it is a fair market value. Of course, I am open to discussing any potential adjustments or concessions, but I would like to emphasize that I am a landlord who wants to maximize my gains. Is 500 Euros a price that you are willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am sorry, but I do not have that budget, I can offer you 400 Euros. However, I am willing to pay a deposit of 200 Euros upfront. This way, if I decide to move out before the end of the lease, you will not lose any rent. If you agree to this offer, we can discuss the terms and conditions of the lease agreement. Thank you for your time.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Understood, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to pay a deposit, as this can help mitigate the risk of vacancy. That being said, I am still seeking a higher rental price that better reflects the value of the apartment. I would like to propose a counteroffer of 450 Euros per month, with a deposit of 250 Euros. Is this a price that you can consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can agree to 450 Euros per month, but I cannot agree to the deposit of 250 Euros. I suggest a deposit of 100 Euros, as this is still sufficient to cover any potential security deposit or penalties that may arise. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate. In that case, I would like to propose a counteroffer of 400 Euros per month, with a deposit of 100 Euros. This price still reflects the quality and location of the apartment, and I believe it is a fair market value. Is this a price that you can consider?
name: Heinrich Heine
